examples.en: A day is 24 hours long.
I'll be back in three hours.
The film runs 5 hours.
He toys his hours away.
examples.ru: Он тратит свои часы на пустяки.

examples.en: She works eight hours a day.
examples.ru: Она работает по восемь часов в день.

examples.en: The examination lasted two hours.
The fire raged for hours.
She is used to working long hours.
examples.ru: Она привыкла к длинному рабочему дню.

examples.en: Long hours really did me in.
Each man watches four hours.
Their talks ran on for hours.
She waited five mortal hours.
They jabbered away for hours.
The hours seemed to fly past.
Three hours later he was back.
They arrived a few hours later.
examples.ru: Они приехали на несколько часов позже.

examples.en: The tape was playing for hours.
Meg was in labour for ten hours.
Please call during office hours.
The police grilled him for hours.
The adjournment lasted two hours.
She was in labour for five hours.
The rain let up after a few hours.
The speech dragged on for two hours
Jim has been at his work for hours.
He had a few fitful hours of sleep.
The meal took two hours to prepare.
He'll be out for eight hours solid.
examples.ru: Он будет отсутствовать восемь часов подряд.

examples.en: He arrived several hours ago.
We waited for hours and hours!
examples.ru: Мы всё ждали и ждали его часами!
